text: Looking for anyone that has <http://Make.com|Make.com> integration experience with HubSpot. Need some consulting time to help us with a project, ASAP.
I did one recently. Whats your question, maybe I can help you?

I'm at the initial stages of just trying to connect a scenario to HubSpot and am getting errors in that process.

Right now in this initial Make test, we're just trying to read a record by using a record ID.

I add the connection using advanced settings (API, User ID, Client ID, Client Secret), then I select the Dev Account in the HubSpot pop-up. I get this error.

*Couldn’t complete the connection*
This account doesn't have access to some HubSpot features that are required by this app. Please contact the app developer.

Then in Make, I get this error above the advanced setting screen.
*Error*
Failed to verify connection 'FrankenDev'. [400] missing or invalid refresh token.   HubSpot Correlation ID: c65674ca-c2f1-4c68-80df-eb6725eb7b55
• Failed to verify connection 'FrankenDev'. [400] missing or invalid refresh token.   HubSpot Correlation ID: c65674ca-c2f1-4c68-80df-eb6725eb7b55
<@U046ZFM3V0R> Optima Solutions is a MAKE Partners as well, do you need support?
<https://lowcode.agency> is great, happy to make an intro, i’ve worked with them before on an integration with Make the HubSpot API for meetings
